summary: Create a clean informational website for an insurance advisor showcasing multiple insurance products/companies and enabling visitors to submit online inquiries.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional hero banner illustration depicting insurance protection themes (family/home/vehicle/health icons in a clean modern style) (hero-insurance.dim_1600x600.png)
- Set of minimal line icons for insurance categories (term, health, vehicle, property, stock, group) in a consistent style (insurance-icons-sprite.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Simple clean logo mark for an insurance advisor brand (abstract shield/umbrella motif), transparent background (advisor-logo.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a multi-section informational website for an insurance advisor that clearly presents the advisorâ€™s offerings across: term insurance (including HDFC Life), health insurance, vehicle insurance, property insurance, stock insurance, group mediclaim insurance, and other insurance products.

Add an online inquiry flow that lets visitors submit an insurance inquiry from the website, including a form with at minimum: full name, phone number, email (optional), insurance type (select), preferred company (optional), and a free-text message/requirements field.

Add an admin-only dashboard page in the frontend that allows the advisor to sign in with Internet Identity and view submitted inquiries (read-only), including basic filtering by insurance type and a detail view per inquiry.

Define and apply a cohesive, modern visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, components) appropriate for a professional insurance advisor brand, and enforce it consistently across all pages/sections.
Add generated static image assets for the site (stored under frontend/public/assets/generated) and use them in the UI.

Add online inquiry/contact form for visitors to submit insurance inquiries
